tenders.title: Construction Project
tenders.description: Seeking bids for a construction project to build a commercial complex.
tenders.eligibilityCriteria: Contractors with at least 5 years of experience in commercial construction.
tenders.submissionProcess: Submit bids online through our website. Required documents include project proposal, cost estimate, and company profile.
tenders.evaluationProcess: Bids will be evaluated based on experience, cost, and previous project references.
tenders.additionalInformation: A pre-bid meeting will be held on December 15th, 2022, at our office premises.

tenders.title: IT Services Tender
tenders.description: Requesting proposals for IT services to manage our company's network infrastructure.
tenders.eligibilityCriteria: IT service providers with relevant certifications and experience in managing large-scale networks.
tenders.submissionProcess: Submit proposals via email in PDF format. Include company profile, service offerings, and pricing details.
tenders.evaluationProcess: Proposals will be evaluated based on technical expertise, pricing, and client references.
tenders.additionalInformation: A site visit is scheduled for November 20th, 2022, at our office location.
